subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A memorial service Thursday marked the 30th anniversary of an airplane crash that killed 29 people, including the entire Evansville men’s team. A wreath with purple and white flowers was placed at a crash memorial monument on a campus plaza.The team plane, a twin-engine DC-3, crashed in rain and heavy fog on Dec. 13, 1977, after takeoff from Evansville Dress Regional Airport to Murfreesboro, Tenn..
